member.name: M:ScratchMessagesChecker.ApiInterface.UserExists(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.param: Can return "ERR_Scratch_Servers_Down" if the Scratch API is not working.
member.returns: True if user exists or False if user does not exist. If the Scratch API is not working, returns false by default.

member.name: M:ScratchMessagesChecker.ApiInterface.GetMessages(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.param: Can return "ERR_Scratch_Servers_Down" if the Scratch API is not working.

member.name: M:ScratchMessagesChecker.ApiInterface.GetRequest(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.param: If true, will throw ScratchServersDownException() if an error occurs. If false, will return "ERR_Scratch_Servers_Down".

member.name: M:ScratchMessagesChecker.ApiInterface.ScratchServersAreBroken
member.summary: Checks if the Scratch Website is broken.
member.returns: True if the Scratch Servers are broken, false if they are working.

member.name: T:ScratchMessagesChecker.ScratchServersDownException
member.summary: ScratchServersDownException means the Scratch API returned a 503 error (Scratch website down for making changes to the website) or (possibly) 404.

member.name: T:ScratchMessagesChecker.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ScratchMessagesChecker.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ScratchMessagesChecker.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
